Pixel format definitions.

Types

ArrayOrder {.size: 4.} = enum
  ARRAYORDER_NONE, ARRAYORDER_RGB, ARRAYORDER_RGBA, ARRAYORDER_ARGB,
  ARRAYORDER_BGR, ARRAYORDER_BGRA, ARRAYORDER_ABGR
Array component order (low byte to high byte). 
BitmapOrder {.size: 4.} = enum
  BITMAPORDER_NONE, BITMAPORDER_4321, BITMAPORDER_1234
Bitmap pixel order (high bit to low bit). 
Color {.final, pure.} = object
  r*: byte
  g*: byte
  b*: byte
  a*: byte
Color. 
PackedLayout {.size: 4.} = enum
  PACKEDLAYOUT_NONE, PACKEDLAYOUT_332, PACKEDLAYOUT_4444, PACKEDLAYOUT_1555,
  PACKEDLAYOUT_5551, PACKEDLAYOUT_565, PACKEDLAYOUT_8888, PACKEDLAYOUT_2101010,
  PACKEDLAYOUT_1010102
Packed component layout. 
PackedOrder {.size: 4.} = enum
  PACKEDORDER_NONE, PACKEDORDER_XRGB, PACKEDORDER_RGBX, PACKEDORDER_ARGB,
  PACKEDORDER_RGBA, PACKEDORDER_XBGR, PACKEDORDER_BGRX, PACKEDORDER_ABGR,
  PACKEDORDER_BGRA
Packed component order (high bit to low bit). 
Palette {.final, pure.} = object
  ncolors*: cint
  colors*: ptr UncheckedArray[Color]
  version*: uint32
  
PixelFormat {.final, pure.} = object
  format*: PixelFormatEnum
  palette*: ptr Palette
  bits_per_pixel*: byte
  bytes_per_pixel*: byte
  rmask*: uint32
  gmask*: uint32
  bmask*: uint32
  amask*: uint32
  rloss*: byte
  gloss*: byte
  bloss*: byte
  aloss*: byte
  rshift*: byte
  gshift*: byte
  bshift*: byte
  ashift*: byte
  next*: ptr PixelFormat
Pixel format. All attributes are read-only.

  PIXELFORMAT_UNKNOWN, PIXELFORMAT_INDEX1LSB = 286261504,

PixelType {.size: 4.} = enum
  PIXELTYPE_UNKNOWN, PIXELTYPE_INDEX1, PIXELTYPE_INDEX4, PIXELTYPE_INDEX8,
  PIXELTYPE_PACKED8, PIXELTYPE_PACKED16, PIXELTYPE_PACKED32, PIXELTYPE_ARRAYU8,
  PIXELTYPE_ARRAYU16, PIXELTYPE_ARRAYU32, PIXELTYPE_ARRAYF16, PIXELTYPE_ARRAYF32
Pixel type.

Consts

ALPHA_OPAQUE = 255'u
ALPHA_TRANSPARENT = 0'u
PIXELFORMAT_ABGR32 = PIXELFORMAT_RGBA8888
PIXELFORMAT_ARGB32 = PIXELFORMAT_BGRA8888
PIXELFORMAT_BGR444 = PIXELFORMAT_XBGR4444
PIXELFORMAT_BGR555 = PIXELFORMAT_XBGR1555
